synopsis.text:
As the radiant legacy of Aurora Dream continues to illuminate the world of Prism Shows, a new generation of ambitious young girls embarks on their journey at Pretty Top, determined to become the next Prism Stars. Among them are Ayami, Karin, and Reina, who find themselves sharing the spotlight with their idols when Mia Ageha audaciously challenges the legendary MARs unit. To prepare for this formidable challenge, the four girls form their own Prism Show unit, Prizmmy☆, and strive to perfect their skills while strengthening their bond.

Meanwhile, five talented girls from overseas arrive at Pretty Top with dreams of making their own debut in Japan. As the competition intensifies, Mia faces unexpected trials, including a surprising reunion with a former friend turned rival. Despite the challenges and the glitzy, cutthroat nature of the Prism Show industry, Mia and her fellow Prizmmy☆ members remain steadfast in their pursuit of stardom.

With their role models, Aira, Rizumu, and Mion, guiding them, the girls of Prizmmy☆ and their Korean counterparts, PURETTY, learn the true meaning of friendship and teamwork as they step onto the stage to embrace their destiny and light up the world with their dazzling performances.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
